sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.TableCleanerList</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Return a list of tables that can be cleaned by TableCleaner.</description>
        <name>TableCleanerList</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TableCleanerList = Class.create();
TableCleanerList.prototype = {
    process: function() {
		var tableCleanerEnabledRec = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
		var allTablesQuery = tableCleanerEnabledRec.addQuery('internal_type','collection');

		var subQuery = new GlideSubQuery('sys_dictionary', 'sys_id', 'sys_id');
		subQuery.addCondition('attributes', 'LIKE', '%disableTableCleaner=false%')
				.addOrCondition('attributes', 'NOT LIKE', '%disableTableCleaner%')
				.addOrCondition('attributes', 'ISEMPTY', '');
		
		allTablesQuery.addCondition(subQuery);
		
		tableCleanerEnabledRec.query();
		var list = new Array();
		while(tableCleanerEnabledRec.next()) {
		  var tableName = tableCleanerEnabledRec.getValue('name');
		  if (SncTableRotationExtensions.isRotationExtension(tableName) || SncTableRotationExtensions.isRotated(tableName)) {
              continue;
		  }
          list.push(tableName);
		}
		return list;
    },

    type: 'TableCleanerList'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-07-07 03:20:51</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5f1f17b2433321104d9ff10b05b8f207</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>TableCleanerList</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Table Cleaner Upgrade Plugin" source="com.snc.autoflush">3053f4a03c31311068bcf327dfe37ff9</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5f1f17b2433321104d9ff10b05b8f207</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-04 17:24:43</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
